column3: “Love this strain. Helps with PTSD, as a vet I recommend this for anyone who struggle to fall asleep”
“this strain is one of my favorite indicas, absolutely love it. has a grapey/earthy taste to it & a mellow/euphoric & spacey type high. definitely recommend with insomnia.”

“Picked some up to help me sleep. I got more than what I bargained for!

Not only did I sleep like a baby but it gave me an incredible psychoactive and psychedelic experience that was very comfortable and relaxing to experience!

Toke up, kill the lights, throw on your favorite tunes and just drift away!”
“If you have ADHD this strain is perfect. A lot of it is good for sleep, and a little bit is good for anxiety and concentration. Thanks mother nature!”

“I find these Kush type strains tend to be the most relaxing and effective for mitigating stress and anxiety and Purple Hindu Kusk (aka Jaegr) is no exception. With a genetic lineage going back to the plants which thrive in the cool dry air of the mountains of Afghanistan and Pakistan, PHK effects are sedative, anxiolytic, and somatic, with the latter providing enhancement of physical sensation and psychic emersion in...”

“I had to decide between this PHK and Blackberry Kush; I'm very happy with my choice. I got an indica to help with pain and insomnia (opiate withdrawal, oh my) and this strain does just that. A strange weed fruit-earth berry-esque flavor that somehow avoids being sweet and the smoke isn't harsh which is a definite plus. I'm supplementing my sativa nugs with this Purple Hindu Kush and I don't feel quite human yet but i...”
“I've been an avid cannabis consumer for many years and I will hands down say this is my number one strain. Incredible body high and one of the only strains I've found can put me to bed asap.”

“very anesthetic high, has both the mellow drowsiness and euphoria of the Purple Kush, but more of the taste and outward appearance of the Hindu parent. not very social, but great for personal use. would work well as relief from insomnia and pain, and is great for thinking, so grab a notebook.”
“The very definition of a mellow, relaxing Indica. Perfect for stress and pain.”

“Great relaxing high and is good for insomnia after it starts to wear down after an hour of a nice euphoric body high. Helps with stress, anxiety, muscle aches and nausea. I like the taste and deep body stone it gives and would recommend it to people with depression, insomnia and muscle spasms. Works immediately.”

“I found this strain to be incredibly helpful with severe back pain! I have 2 lower back fusions and a cervical fusion as well. To top it all off I have a broken leg!! Thank you Cannabliss, Springfield, OR 😊”

“had this as a co2 cartridge fröm the co2 company. perfect indica for the indica lovers. Nice body high, slight slight head high. I smoked too much of this on my first time trying it and thought I was on acid for a minute. once you get used to it it's nice. careful with this one if youre not familiar with strong indicas. very relaxing once you get used to it. It's a bunch of different indicas bred together if you look...”
“Great strain. Nice dense and slow burning. Nice slightly piney and floral smell. Very relaxing effects. This is one of my favorite strains for sleeping and relaxation.”
“medicaluser for awhile. I believe this strain was initially called jager" at least that is what my caregiver said. Could not have been more pleased. The taste is outstanding
column6: pungent- typical indica...very nice strain great for anxiety
column7: pain. would recommend for anyone who likes a good indica.”"

column3: “This bud is extremely relaxing without being overly sedative. The psychoactive effects are coupled with a heavy yet smooth dark berry flavor. I would recommend this to anyone looking to kick back and relax.”

“perfect indica for the indica lovers. Nice body high, slight slight head high. I smoked too much of this last night and thought I was on acid for a minute. careful with this one if youre not familiar with strong indicas! once I had this a few times I got used to and relaxed to the high it gives. It's a bunch of different indicas bred together if you look at the lineage so there's just a bunch of different stuff going...”
“love it! 20 % at nectar”

“Wow-- this packs a punch.  I was definitely couch locked, and I felt physical tension melt away.  This strain made me feel emotionally sensitive-- so maybe avoid if you are on edge.  Don't smoke this if you are planning on doing anything productive.  I do think this would be a great wind down and think about (but not necessarily act upon) problems kind of high.”
“Great for smoking before bed. Tastes great. Let’s me fall asleep super easy.”

“Purple Hindu Kush gets me stoned! It does it fast too! A lovely combo of two great strains this indica is strong and delicious. With a sweet grape like flavor and a light woodsie splash I could puff on it all day. It has amazing fast acting pain relief and leaves me nearly couch locked. If you have stuff to do this may not be your best option as it tends to make me a little stupid. Great before bed.”
“Great taste. Amazing indica. I prefer indica. And this is among the top.”

“Local shop tried to sell me this a few times, but from a distance it really wasn’t appealing. I finally got a close look and whiff and had to try it. I must say it’s definitely a go to strain now. Nothing can compare to it’s relaxation and help with sleep, true medicine. Two thumbs way up. It’s also great tasting and smooth. Highly recommend it for the indica lovers or anyone trying to get some zzzs. Strong but not o...”
“This strain is very good! A cross of two classic strains, Purple Hindu Kush offers very deep relaxation. I feel very stoned" and absolutely couch locked. All pain has melted

column1: If you need a strain to help you relax
column3: or just take your mind off things
column4: this is the strain for you.”"

column3: “Better than oxy and less addictive for pain. Paving with no cartilage in my knee, bone grinds on bone. A couple rips and I'm paving till lunch.”

“This is amazing, I always thought I was a Sativa kinda guy. Even going as far as straying from any Indica or Indica dom hybrid. WRONG. This strain is pure love. great taste, great look, lovely effects. deff 5 star strain.”
“bought this a few weeks ago great stuff for pain.”

“PHK is an indica that's almost always in my medicine cabinet for evening pain relief and/or insomnia.  For maximum effect I prefer smoking joints but this is great smoked from anything.  Also some people who are sensitive to the standard cannabis" smell
column4: this strain has a strong bouquet of musk and sandalwood
column5: and is similar in taste.  Hope everyone tries this strain a time or two.”"

column3: “Absolutly love this strain!!! I keep going back to the vth and buying eighths like ever two days because im afraid there not gunna have it for too much longer... Gotta get as much as i can :)”

column1: If you need a strain to help you relax
column3: or just take your mind off things
column4: this is the strain for you.”"

column3: “Smoked it in a preroll from my local cannabis retail store. Shared with S and we didn't even finish it. We each had had a square of Pineapple (5.2 mg THC) chocolate about an hour prior. I don't know if it was the combination or just the PHK, but  we were very stoned and VERY horny. We fucked 6 or 7 times and S's orgasms were very long and VERY intense. I was quite rough and really talked dirty a lot, just telling her...”

“Local shop tried to sell me this a few times, but from a distance it really wasn’t appealing. I finally got a close look and whiff and had to try it. I must say it’s definitely a go to strain now. Nothing can compare to it’s relaxation and help with sleep, true medicine. Two thumbs way up. It’s also great tasting and smooth. Highly recommend it for the indica lovers or anyone trying to get some zzzs. Strong but not o...”

“I purchased this strain to combat insomnia. After a few inhales on my vaporizer, I usually feel very relaxed and giggly. This early response melts into a heavily dazed, sleepy state and a SERIOUS case of the munchies. 

This strain makes me hungrier than any other Indica I've tried. For me, I prefer other Indicas that put me to sleep more effectively and are less munchie-inducing.

Further, PHK often leaves me very d...”

“I purchased this strain to combat insomnia. After a few inhales on my vaporizer, I usually feel very relaxed and giggly. This early response melts into a heavily dazed, sleepy state and a SERIOUS case of the munchies. 

This strain makes me hungrier than any other Indica I've tried. For me, I prefer other Indicas that put me to sleep more effectively and are less munchie-inducing.

Further, PHK often leaves me very d...”

“Can only find this strain in vape cartridges (Oklahoma).  This is what’s up!  Tastes so good.  I suffer from PTSD, Anxiety and depression all causing insomnia.  This helps with ALL, with no paranoia as a side effect.  It just calms me immediately. I can not find this strain in FLOWER or to grow, I keep searching....this is God’s Nectar”
“quickly transports me to a blissful slumber.”

“I just rolled a gram of some lovely p.h.k from pipe dreams dispensary.
This batch tested at 21.92% in Oregon.
dense mugs with shades of lime green and lavender, with a pungent odor reminiscent of licorice with undertones of musk, and earthy pine.
may I say wow.
This is a vibrant cerebral buzz with excellent body effects, now I know batches Wil vary, but this one hit the spot, so much that the  spot" hit back”"

“this sweet tasting flower is what's up. the high for me was mellow (indica) but i was still able to converse. 
my anxiety was completely gone..
it allows me to sleep the entire night. no more insomnia.. and i wake up feeling refreshed”
“In my top favorite strains! Still haven’t found anything like it.”

“I suffer from insomnia and this helps me sleep! I've tried many indica strains. I've also asked the dispensaries I've been to, what they would recommend but this time I researched strains on Leafly; I tried a strain based on reviews. The reviews are accurate and helpful!”
“Fantastic relaxed high put me. right to sleep for sure a hard indica”
“In my top favorite strains! Still haven’t found anything like it.”
“I hope you're ready to get stuck on a couch, reading the same page of a book over, and over.”

“WOW!! Talk about packing a punch! Purple Hindu Kush has to be one of the stronger strains I've smoked. The flowery-kush aroma was spectacular and its flavor was truly unique. As a seasoned smoker, this strain took about 7 minutes to make itself known. It definitely made me feel relaxed and euphoric... very euphoric! I highly recommend this strain if you can vape it as this will pull out the most flavor. I purchased m...”

“Probably the first strain I think of when somebody asks me for my favorite strains. It does the best for me, flavorful, euphoric, comforting, almost nourishing. It smells like a colorful mountain pass.”

“PHK is a solid strain to help release my pain after work. I’m he high starts in your head, then slowly releases pain through your body - all while keeping your spirits uplifted. This is a strain I always keep on hand.”

“Probably the first strain I think of when somebody asks me for my favorite strains. It does the best for me, flavorful, euphoric, comforting, almost nourishing. It smells like a colorful mountain pass.”
“Fantastic relaxed high put me. right to sleep for sure a hard indica”
“I must say my husband and i had some euphoric sex on this one..every blunt was just some hot sex then good sleep”

“I suffer from insomnia and this helps me sleep! I've tried many indica strains. I've also asked the dispensaries I've been to, what they would recommend but this time I researched strains on Leafly; I tried a strain based on reviews. The reviews are accurate and helpful!”

“Really cool weed. Very strong indica, had me very relaxed with an intense body high. Munchies and cotton mouth are real with this one forsure. Very cool looking weed, with a deep purple vibe to it, Knocked me out as soon as i laid down. Would recommend deffinetly, but could not smoke it regularly.”

“Helps me sleep better than any other strain, but can still be nice during the day. I've purchased this strain from several dispensaries, ranged from 18 to 23 percent THC, always one of the cheaper strains available, and have loved it every time. Nugs have never been crystal covered, usually looks rather average, some hints of purple, some orange hairs. The smell is always potent and pungent. Overall grab it up if you...”

“I suffer from awful anxiety on pot, so much so I almost stopped smoking. Purple hindu kush was a recommendation, and man did they get it right!

Smells lovely, lavender and incense, burns slow as it's so reinous, so dosing is easier than the bone dry stuff I was smoking. 

Heavy body stone, very relaxing cloud pillow niceness. A tiny trippy edge to it, very tactile and enjoyable.

My second hit of the evening led to ...”

“This is my go-to evening strain as of late. It's a great smoke to settle in for some TV watching before bed. This strain helps with my insomnia and keeps my mind from racing on unnecessary things. For me it's not a very social strain, though maintaining conversation while using PHK is not terrible - paranoia is at a low. It does give me the munchies, which for me is a con. Overall I highly recommend trying it out.”

“This is my go-to evening strain as of late. It's a great smoke to settle in for some TV watching before bed. This strain helps with my insomnia and keeps my mind from racing on unnecessary things. For me it's not a very social strain, though maintaining conversation while using PHK is not terrible - paranoia is at a low. It does give me the munchies, which for me is a con. Overall I highly recommend trying it out.”
“This is one of my favorite bed time smokes. Powerful sour grape smell, dense buds, full of flavor. Very hungry, very sleepy.”
“very relaxing!!!”
“This and JGR are essentially the same thing.”

“The smell of grape and citrus greens fresh off tha bag... Was great !! Dense medium buds..Hard hitting..huge clouds.. Typical of most Kush..however this strain is pretty smooth.. This bud will deliver within 4 solid tokes ..easly but you'll want more.. Good social bud..Medically..GREAT.. This bud will ease your stress..unwind..chill..relaxes .. Which helps with body soreness.. Twist a G and enjoy the next 2 to 3 hrs....”

“Very strong strain, I'm usually very tolerant so I had about 7 grams worth of it and I thought I was going to die, I had to concentrate on breathing and I thought that i saw the distance future where my friends slowly stopped hanging out until we never saw each other until our funerals. if you have inner turmoil I would suggest only smoking what you can handle”
“Hands down my favorite strain. Struggling with anxiety, depression, PTSD, and insomnia I personally can't think if a better strain.”

“A solid indica! I've had PHK many times now. It usually comes in midsized nugs, that have a lot a brown trichomes all over. It has a nice sweet & berry aroma. This heavy indica is great for full body relaxation. PHK makes me tired after a couple bowls, therefore I use it exclusive at night. I'd recommend PHK to anyone who enjoys a heavy indica!”
“This train was a very earthy but mellow flavor I liked the affect and very well for pain”

“I love Purple Hindu Kush! It has an amazing flavor in both flower and oil. It gave me a very nice body high and a light, 'happy' head high. I was very relaxed after a few dabs. I would have to rate Purple Hindu Kush as my my favorite strain so far... so of course I gave it a 5!”
“always good in a wood”
“Amazing strain with a wonderful look, smell, and taste. Highly recommend if you love sweet and sour smelling bud that has a wonderful high and it helps to relieve pain greatly.”
“This stuff is so damn powerful, only a few hits and I was blasted into intense pain relief along with a very strong mental trip. Not for beginners! This will knock you out with very little ;)”
“I love Purple Hindu because it’s got some tasty terpenes ♥️”
“One of the best bang for your buck strains on the market. This indica will have you shaking your head off for hours. It's in a peaceful way though.”
“got 1/8 for 17.99 at Going green excellent !!!”
“One of the best bang for your buck strains on the market. This indica will have you shaking your head off for hours. It's in a peaceful way though.”

“I found PHK to have a berry and earthy undertone flavor.  The high was a very comfortable and relaxed, happy feeling. My only complaint was that the initial high only lasted about an hour or an hour and a half. Don't let that discourage you from buying this Indica though. It is a well rounded Indica with the heavy head high and a relaxed tingling feeling in your body. One of my favorites but expensive to do on anythi...”
“Hindu Kush is my favorite strain and to mix it with anything afghani...man what a relaxing, super chillax combo thats perfect for pm smokers.”

“I picked this up cause I have not smoked any kush in such a long time and this is a very enjoyable indica and it's very true to the land race in my opinion. Deep purple/brown flowers and very dense. The flavor and aroma is phenomenal. Lavender and grape is what I taste and inhale. The exhale is smooth and more floral. It's fantastic. 
If you're looking for some cannabis that will take away your stress, relax your body and sedate your mind until the combination of the three put you to sleep... Try Purple Hind...”

“If you suffer from depression or anxiety make sure you’re in a good mood before smoking this. Not the kind of strain that will put you in a good mood if you’re down. It magnifies your thoughts while knocking you on your ass. I have a hate love relationship with this strain. If I’m in a good mood and smoke it the rest of my day is great, if I’m upset and need to relax it just magnifies it and makes you more on edge. I...”

Beautiful strain, very fun and cool to look at. Very deep purple look to it, Recommend to try forsure, not sure if i could handle it regularly.”

“Was very up lifting pains just melted 
 a and  super good purple and green nugs  fully of crystals nice lite lavender flowerish 
Smell”

“I will forever be a loyal smoker to purps! That being said Purple Hindu Kush is a home run, and my pre-roll was the size of a baseball bat. Flavor notes involve  a very naturally sweet tasting flower. Smooth smoking and very nice head vibe.”

“If you're like me and have ever purchased flower simply based off of how beautiful it is and how delicious it smells, then you'll love this strain.  These buds are so gorgeous it's almost sad to smoke them, but you should!  Delicious flavor, excellent Indica mellow type of high, the type of smoke that will make you fall into an art project or favorite album.”
“This is by far one of my favorite strains. Grows very hearty buds that have a very unique flavor. Strong high very relaxing, smooth burning. The purples and orange hues make it a beautiful bud.”
“awesome taste very relaxing but still energized great day bud”

“PHK is a tasty indica that will stimulate an intimate relationship between the consumer, and their couch. For a somewhat imposing dense bud, I found her to taste surprisingly fruity and light. Her aroma brought to mind a fresh melon salad with some floral hints.”

“Using the metric of purple equating to an Indica, Purple Hindu Kush is a straight down the middle of the road Indica, at least to me. Not being too sedating and certainly not bouncing off the walls, but a great relaxing strain. Its a wondrous strain for PTSD, trust me. The colors are bright with orange and red pistils against the backdrop of gorgeous purple" really purple leaves.

column1: It did not help me fall asleep as w...”"

column3: “Damn, thats some danky stuff. I had some concentrate from Dreadneck and it was the greatest experience i have had yet with concentrates. the taste was amazing and the feeling was killer”
“Pretty good! Dulled the pain associated with Fibromyalgia, however it did give me a slight headache and the relief didn't last as long as I was hoping. It's a great option, just not my go to!”
“Has become one of my go to indicas. Especially since indica is all I smoke. Love the flavor.  It's so good in my joints. Then in the bowl it's a hard hitter.”

“OMG I hate this strain. If you suffer from tinnitus stay as far away from Purple Hindu as you can. It spiked my tinnitus through the roof and it took nearly 3 weeks to return to baseline. It also worsened my depression considerably. And to top it off, the strain was not particularly fun. I experienced very little euphoria and just became extremely spacey and sleepy. I felt terribly groggy when I woke up rather than r...”
“awesome buzz head to toe.”
“Very nice Indica, real chill and has great citrusy taste”
“very relaxing!!!”

“A solid indica that is nice for someone who wants an indica that not completely sedative, but has a nice flavor and look. The buds were dense dark green and purple flowers with speckles of light orange calyxes. The smell is sweet and woody, with some piney undertones. The flavor is a nice sweet berry with a touch of earth to it. The effects made me kind of cloudy and groggy. Definitely relaxing.”
“Just had my favorite grow of this strain. Wow I've had some before but this here looks beautiful and tastes like sweet candy”
“Nice and balanced if I don't smoke too much. uplifting and kinda heady at first,  then drifts down.  becomes relaxing after a bit, also gave me the munchies from hell as well.”

“This is quickly becoming a favorite! It's mellow, relaxing, excellent body relief without total couchlock. Mellow buzz, talkative phase before just comfortably settling in. Good pain relief, great before bedtime. Peaceful nights sleep and fabulous for anxiety related to my PTSD. A must have for indica lovers as well as those who need help relaxing.”
“love PHD. This strain makes you go on adventures in your mind if that makes sense lol”
“Phk is great bang for your buck. Works great for insomnia, arthritis pain. Works well lowering my B P .”
“Super relaxing and calming. Very little anxiety. Definitely a body high. I️ enjoy it.”
“I find this works well on my fibromyalgia and is relaxing to boot!”
“I got this in shatter from cannabis crew and its gas bro. One dab and that was that. I get oiled up 3to4 times a day. Deffenitly quality product.”
“Does everything you'd expect from a good Indica!”
“Very stenchy and dank!   Great spacey buzz and total painkiller!”
“Nice sleepy, relaxed high. No paranoia or elevated heart rate, minimal dry mouth. Slight munchies.”
“So very Happy with this strain, helps my chronic pain, thank you and hopes it stays around.”
“Fantastic. Helps me mellow out. Pain relieving medicine.”

“Crazy weed. Deep purple look to it, very fun to mess around with no doubt. Strong indica, had me very relaxed with an incredible body high. Munchies and cotton mouth are real with this one. Would recommend to try it, but could not smoke it regularly. Bong worked great with this strain.”

“Good Indica Kush.  It tastes nice and smokes pretty smooth in joint form.  Buzz kicks in late around 10-15 minutes. Nice relaxed buzz that you would expect from a good Indica strain. My only complaint is that the buzz only lasted around an hour.  But even with that, it's hard to complain about PHK. ✌🏼❤️”
“Amazing analgesic properties. Noticeable even after consuming large amounts of other potential strains”

“Very pleasant and smooth. Me being a fan of Grandaddy P & Purple H, PHK is a great substitute if u can't find either strains. I noticed the density of the nugs very in differnet dispensaries. I love dense better than fluffy but ill take whatever I can get lol The only thing I can say I kinda of dont like, and remember this my opinion, the taste is too piney but maybe the taste has to do with the grower, like i said e...”
“Very good bud. I love the color”

“Easily one of my favourite indica strains.  The bud looks amazing with beautiful purple and amber green colours on it covered with a coat of crystals.  The inhale is very gentle that provides a heavy body buzz that leaves you relaxed.  Cant say enough about this strain”
“Great strain for pain and insomnia. Great head and body effects, lots of fruity, piney flavor.  Try it and you will like it!”
“love it !!! at the silverstem the joints are tastey yum yum 20% hindu”

“Burn down one joint of this and you'll be spaced bound like George Lucas. It has a very relaxing, happy and heavenly vibe. Although the fire begins to burn out after 1 1/2 - 2 hours, it flickers down putting you into a deep and very restful sleep. This Indica is pure and heavy on the mind and body, it can still be a good daytime buzz if you reload every couple hours, in my opinion. Works wonders for my insomnia and a...”
“It does like the people say.”

“I feel like a Sage who has just stumbled upon this star in out in the mountains of the Hindu Kush. Suddenly I invest the flower and I make a bunch of self discoveries. so yeah if you want an introspective strain,then this is definititely it. Also if you find the essential thought to be stressful to the point it is unbearable; Well then this PHK isnt for you.”

“Gotta love the Phk designation lol. Anyway, super super good strain. Looks, taste, smell all would be 10/10. The high is a mix of a really euphoric, relaxing GG4 and a heavy afghani indica body high that has a tendency to knock my a$$ out. In my top 5 easily. I don't throw out too many 5 star ratings. So oil or flower, try this strain if u can.”

“i cannot feel my body. my legs are not restless (i have rls). my eyes are heavy and pretty dry and i have cotton mouth, but the thought of confusing much right now makes a lump form in my throat. i’m not nauseous, but if i ate i feel like i would be. i wanna play pubg”

“The Jaeger has recently come to AZ.  What a joke. Is this even the real cut? 

Grew pleeeeenty of this in Jefferson. Great stuff, dep or Od.  I guess the region foes matter alot. 

Its great smoke,  purp taste and deadlegs.  Just don't let some novice grower pawn it off on you.  Smell for that purple chewy sweettart"  smell.. Otherwise it's bunk!”"

“I just got a gram of IT today to give IT a try because I've never had IT before. Smoking on Berry White right now, going to save the PHK Until I'm ready to go to sleep, I read on Leafly review IT'S Good for a Good Night of Rest which I need. Off work tomorrow so I definitely hope PHK does the job. I definitely already like IT'S Look and scent.”

“This is definitely my favorite strain of all time. It is such a wonderful flower and I swear by it. It relieves my stress and makes me actually enjoy the day. It doesn’t make me feel paranoid or anxious. “Hands down dopest dope I’ve ever smoked.””
